title: Justice Abid Aziz Sheikh to take oath as acting CJ LHC on 10th
content:
LAHORE, Aug 09 (APP):Justice Abid Aziz Sheikh will take the oath as acting chief justice of the Lahore High Court (LHC) on Saturday.
According to an LHC press release, the oath-taking ceremony will be held in the LHC Judges’ Lounge at 9:00 a.m., where Justice Shahid Karim will administer the oath to the acting chief justice. The judges working at the LHC Principal Seat will attend the ceremony.
It is pertinent to mention that LHC Chief Justice Miss Aalia Neelum is on a foreign visit.
